p: The NoV represents the most important cause of epidemics of nonbacterial gastroenteritis in the world (housing, 2005). These viruses infect adults as well as children, as shown in Figure 40.2, Figure 40.3. They represent 40%–50% of gastroenteritis related to food in the United States ( Dolin, 2007). The main viruses infecting the adults in the United Kingdom in 2008–09 are the NoV and SAV ( FSA, 2012).
